review.title: Finite LTL Synthesis is EXPTIME-complete
review.abstract: LTL synthesis -- the construction of a function to satisfy a logical specification formulated in Linear Temporal Logic -- is a 2EXPTIME-complete problem with relevant applications in controller synthesis and a myriad of artificial intelligence applications. In this research note we consider De Giacomo and Vardi's variant of the synthesis problem for LTL formulas interpreted over finite rather than infinite traces. Rather surprisingly, given the existing claims on complexity, we establish that LTL synthesis is EXPTIME-complete for the finite interpretation, and not 2EXPTIME-complete as previously reported. Our result coincides nicely with the planning perspective where non-deterministic planning with full observability is EXPTIME-complete and partial observability increases the complexity to 2EXPTIME-complete; a recent related result for LTL synthesis shows that in the finite case with partial observability, the problem is 2EXPTIME-complete.

metadata.title: Finite LTL Synthesis is EXPTIME-complete

sections.text: The LTL synthesis - the construction of a function to satisfy a logical specification formulated in the Linear Temporal Logic - is a 2EXPTIME-complete problem with relevant applications in controller synthesis and a myriad of artificial intelligence applications. In this research note, we consider De Giacomo and Vardis variant of the synthesis problem for LTL formulas interpreted via finite rather than infinite tracks. Given the existing claims to complexity, we are rather surprised to find that the LTL synthesis for the finite interpretation is EXPTIME-complete and not 2EXPTIME-complete as previously reported. Our result is well in line with the planning perspective, where non-deterministic planning with full observability EXPTIME-complete and partial observability completely increases the complexity on 2EXPTIME; a newer related result for the LTL synthesis shows that in the finite-observability problem with full observability is EXPTIME-complete.
